name: Bug Boogie
description:
BUG BOOGIE: The insect-themed rhythm game, coming to PC, Mac, and Linux!

Join Groovy Jerry as he goes on a journey  to meet new bandmates and become the champion in the Bug Boogie Band competition!

FEATURES:

Five awesome levels!

Five super cute characters!

~10 minutes of playtime in story mode

Keyboard support

Level select mode for short play

Brought to you by UNTITLED GAMES, the four-student studio!

Release 0.35:

The mostly-complete game. Currently implementing final parts!

Woah! How do I play?!

Download the .ZIP file from this page and unzip it using whichever program you prefer, or utilize the Itch app, which will do it for you! Then, find the .EXE file within the folder you unzipped, double click, and enjoy!

Who made this awesome game?

A team of four students from Eastern Michigan University for the Intro to Unity I class. We hope you enjoy!
